summary: The implementation successfully addresses all three requirements. A utility function (sellBillGenerator.ts) was created to generate HTML for sell bills, SellModule.tsx was modified to trigger the print dialog after saving sales, and the generated bill includes all required fields: company header 'ANMOL DAIRY LIFE', farmer name (optional), product details, pricing, quantity, total amount, and timestamp.

hallucinated_features.description: Manual print button with Printer icon in SellModule.tsx
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not specify a manual print button or icon. It only requires automatic print dialog triggering after save. The handlePrint function and Printer icon button were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Signature sections (Customer Signature and Authorized Signature) in the sell bill
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not mention signature placeholders or sections. Only farmer name, product name, price per unit, quantity, total amount, date/time, and company header were specified.

hallucinated_features.description: Subtitle 'Product Sale Receipt' below company header
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only specifies company header 'ANMOL DAIRY LIFE' at the top. No subtitle or additional header text was requested.
